name: Wizarre
description:
Enter the world of Wizarre, where strategy, spells, and teamwork are crucial to your journey. Are you ready to rise through the ranks, claim your rightful place at the pinnacle of the global leaderboard, and unleash the full potential of your inner Wizard? The adventure begins now, and the only limits are the ones you set for yourself.



Assemble a formidable team of three Wizards, each with unique statistics, strengths, and abilities. The power of choice lies in your hands as you carefully select your team members, considering which combination of over 100 spells suits your tactical approach best. Will you choose a balanced mix of offensive, defensive, and ultimate spells or specialize in a specific magic school? The choice is yours. And, to add a touch of personal flair, customize your Wizards' appearance with an array of skins that you can unlock by levelling up your account and opening Lootballs.



Duel your way to greatness in epic battles that pit your team of three mighty Wizards against opponents from across the globe. The action is turn-based, with each round lasting just 45 seconds. During your turn, you'll need to manage your Wizards' time and mana wisely. With a limited mana pool, every spell you cast matters, and choosing the right combination is crucial to victory. However, be cautious, for the more your Wizards fly, the faster your timer drops. This creates a dynamic balance between strategic aerial manoeuvres and conserving your precious time. With seven themed gameplay maps, each with unconventional challenges, Wizarre ensures endless excitement and strategic depth.



Wizarre offers a truly magical experience with crossplay support, allowing you to take your outstanding adventures from PC to mobile devices and back. Whether on the go or seated at your gaming desk, you can engage in exciting battles against enemies worldwide.

Challenge your friends or make new allies through the Play with Friend mode, where your skills are tested against opponents on various platforms. It's a world of endless possibilities where the magic never ends.
